en: The Royal Hong Kong Jockey Club

description.zh-cn: 香港一家于1884年成立的非牟利保证有限公司，负责提供赛马运动、体育运动及博彩娱乐，为全球规模最大的赛马机构之一，同时也是香港最大的单一纳税机构和主要雇主之一。
description.en: A non-profit limited company founded in 1884 in Hong Kong, responsible for providing horse racing, sports, and betting entertainment. It is one of the largest horse racing organizations in the world, as well as Hong Kong's largest single taxpayer and a major employer.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会34名创会会员之一，并于1892年至1926年间担任马会主席。
description.en: One of the 34 founding members of The Hong Kong Jockey Club, and served as its chairman from 1892 to 1926.

description.zh-cn: 香港的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 1918年2月26日在香港跑马地马场发生的一场严重火灾。
description.en: A catastrophic fire that occurred on 26 February 1918 at the Happy Valley Racecourse in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 前香港总督，在其授意下，香港赛马会于1927年开始吸纳华裔会员。
description.en: Former Governor of Hong Kong, under whose initiative The Hong Kong Jockey Club began to admit Chinese members in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名买办，为香港赛马会于1927年吸纳的首批华裔会员之一。
description.en: A prominent Hong Kong comprador, one of the first Chinese members admitted to The Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会于1927年吸纳的首批华裔会员之一。
description.en: One of the first Chinese members admitted to The Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1927.

description.zh-cn: 前英国女王，于1960年授予香港赛马会“皇家”称号。
description.en: Former Queen of the United Kingdom, who granted the 'Royal' title to The Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1960.

nodes.id: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金

zh-cn: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金
en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club Charities Trust

description.zh-cn: 由香港赛马会创立，专责管理慈善捐款的分配和运营。
description.en: Established by The Hong Kong Jockey Club to manage the allocation and operation of charitable donations.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1997年7月1日恢复对香港行使主权的事件。
description.en: The event in which the People's Republic of China resumed the exercise of sovereignty over Hong Kong on July 1, 1997.

description.zh-cn: 澳门的赛马机构，已于2024年停业。
description.en: The horse racing organization in Macau, which ceased operations in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，行政会议召集人，曾提议增加赛马会足球博彩收入税。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician and Convenor of the Executive Council, who proposed an increase in the football betting tax on the Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 香港财政司司长，于2023年增加了足球博彩税。
description.en: Financial Secretary of Hong Kong, who increased the football betting tax in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，香港赛马会董事局主席。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician and Chairman of the Board of Stewards of The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会行政总裁。
description.en: Chief Executive Officer of The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港新界的赛马场，由香港赛马会营运。
description.en: A racecourse located in the New Territories of Hong Kong, operated by The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广东省广州市从化区的马匹训练设施及赛马场，由香港赛马会营运。
description.en: A horse training facility and racecourse in Conghua District, Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, China, operated by The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 一场始于2019年末的全球性传染病大流行。
description.en: A global pandemic of infectious disease that began in late 2019.

nodes.id: 香港赛马会场外投注处

zh-cn: 香港赛马会场外投注处
en: Hong Kong Jockey Club Off-Course Betting Branch

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会设立于赛马场外的投注设施网络。
description.en: A network of betting facilities established by The Hong Kong Jockey Club outside of its racecourses.

description.zh-cn: 香港的合法奖券游戏，由香港赛马会主办。
description.en: A legal lottery game in Hong Kong, operated by The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会提供的合法足球赛事博彩服务。
description.en: A legal football betting service provided by The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

en: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 香港的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院

zh-cn: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院
en: Jockey Club College of Veterinary Medicine and Life Sciences

description.zh-cn: 香港城市大学下的一个学院，由香港赛马会慈善信托基金捐款支持。
description.en: A college within the City University of Hong Kong, supported by a donation from The Hong Kong Jockey Club Charities Trust.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 遮打是香港赛马会的34名创会会员之一。
description.en: Paul Chater was one of the 34 founding members of The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 遮打于1892年至1926年担任香港赛马会主席。
description.en: Paul Chater served as the Chairman of The Hong Kong Jockey Club from 1892 to 1926.

description.zh-cn: 香港政府批准香港赛马会独家经营香港赛马、六合彩及海外体育运动赛事博彩。
description.en: The Hong Kong Government granted The Hong Kong Jockey Club the exclusive right to operate horse racing, Mark Six lottery, and overseas sports betting in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 跑马地马场大火是香港赛马会历史上的一起重大灾难事件。
description.en: The Happy Valley Racecourse fire was a major disaster in the history of The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 在香港总督金文泰的授意下，香港赛马会开始吸纳华裔会员。
description.en: Under the initiative of Governor Cecil Clementi, The Hong Kong Jockey Club began to admit Chinese members.

description.zh-cn: 成为香港赛马会首批被吸纳的华裔会员之一。
description.en: Became one of the first Chinese members admitted to The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 成为香港赛马会首批被吸纳的华裔会员之一。
description.en: Became one of the first Chinese members admitted to The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 授予香港赛马会“皇家”称号，使其更名为“英皇御准香港赛马会”。
description.en: Granted the 'Royal' title to The Hong Kong Jockey Club, leading to its renaming as 'The Royal Hong Kong Jockey Club'.

relationships.target: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会于1993年成立香港赛马会慈善信托基金，专责管理慈善捐款的事宜。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club established The Hong Kong Jockey Club Charities Trust in 1993 to manage its charitable donations.

description.zh-cn: 因应香港即将回归中国，“英皇御准香港赛马会”于1996年7月1日改回原名“香港赛马会”。
description.en: In anticipation of Hong Kong's return to China, 'The Royal Hong Kong Jockey Club' reverted to its original name 'The Hong Kong Jockey Club' on July 1, 1996.

description.zh-cn: 于2005年签订协议，容许澳门赛马会在澳门接受香港赛马投注，直到澳门赛马会2024年停业为止。
description.en: Signed an agreement in 2005 allowing the Macau Jockey Club to accept bets on Hong Kong races in Macau, until the Macau Jockey Club ceased operations in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 提议增加赛马会足球博彩收入税，赛马会对此表示反对，认为此举将“摧毁”其商业模式。
description.en: Proposed to increase the football betting tax on the Jockey Club, which the Club opposed, stating the move would 'destroy' its business model.

description.zh-cn: 作为财政司司长增加了足球博彩税。
description.en: As Financial Secretary, increased the football betting tax.

position.en: Chairman of the Board of Stewards

description.zh-cn: 担任香港赛马会董事局主席。
description.en: Serves as the Chairman of the Board of Stewards of The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 自2007年起担任香港赛马会行政总裁。
description.en: Has served as the Chief Executive Officer of The Hong Kong Jockey Club since 2007.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会兴建并于1978年10月7日启用沙田马场。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club built and opened the Sha Tin Racecourse on October 7, 1978.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会兴建并于2018年8月启用位于广东省从化市的马匹训练中心。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club built and opened the horse training center in Conghua, Guangdong in August 2018.

relationships.target: 香港赛马会场外投注处

description.zh-cn: 因应新型冠状病毒疫情，所有场外投注站于2020年2月5日起关闭，直至2021年2月22日重开。
description.en: In response to the COVID-19 pandemic, all Off-Course Betting Branches were closed from February 5, 2020, until February 22, 2021.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会于1975年受政府委托接受六合彩投注。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club was entrusted by the government to accept Mark Six lottery bets in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会于2003年获授权接受海外足球赛事投注，即足智彩。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club was authorized in 2003 to accept bets on overseas football matches, known as HKJC Football.

description.zh-cn: 于1992年创校的香港科技大学是由马会拨款兴建。
description.en: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, founded in 1992, was constructed with funding from The Hong Kong Jockey Club.

relationships.source: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金
relationships.target: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院

description.zh-cn: 向香港城市大学捐款五亿港元资助其动物医学及生命科学院，学院因此冠名为“赛马会动物医学及生命科学院”。
description.en: Donated HK$500 million to the City University of Hong Kong to support its College of Veterinary Medicine and Life Sciences, which was subsequently named 'Jockey Club College of Veterinary Medicine and Life Sciences'.

relationships.source: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院

description.zh-cn: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院是香港城市大学下的一个学院。
description.en: The Jockey Club College of Veterinary Medicine and Life Sciences is a college within the City University of Hong Kong.
